title: Card Effect
description: Schema for defining card effects in the game.

effectTargetType.description: The type of target the effect applies to. E.g. Self, Whole Board, etc.

effectType.description: The type of effect the card has. E.g. Buff, Damage, Heal, etc.

triggerTime.description: The time the effect is triggered. E.g. On Play, On Death etc.

targetSelection.description: How card effects are selected (random, adjacent, etc.)

targetable.description: The targetable types for player to select. E.g. All allies, enemy units etc.

needsTargeting.description: Whether the effect requires manual targeting.

numTargets.description: Number of targets the effect applies to.

spawnUnitCardStatsSO.description: Reference to a unit card's stats ScriptableObject, if applicable.
